import useInput2 from "../hooks/use-input2"; const BasicForm = (props) => { const { value: enteredFirstName, isTouched: firstNameBlur, hasError: firstError, enteredValueHandler: enteredFirstNameHandler, inputBlurHandler: inputFirstNameBlurHandler, reset: resetFirstName } = useInput2(value => value.trim() !== '') const { value: enteredName, isTouched: nameBlur, hasError: hasError, enteredValueHandler: enteredNameHandler, inputBlurHandler: inputNameBlurHandler, reset: resetName } = useInput2(value => value.trim() !== '') return (
); }; export default BasicForm;
